div.div: Buffalo St. College vs. Kean University
at Union, N.J. | Kean Alumni Stadium

tr.td: Buffalo wins the toss and defers. Kean will receive.
Nick Debbins kickoff 48 yards to the KEAN22, Jamahl Williams return 23 yards to the KEAN45, out-of-bounds (Chad Griffin).
PENALTY BUF personal foul 15 yards to the BUF40, 1ST DOWN KEAN.
